titleStmt.title: Pelecanicidium, or, The Christian adviser against self-murder together with a guide and the pilgrims passe to the land of the living : in three books.
titleStmt.author: Denny, William, Sir, 1603 or 4-1676.
Barlow, Francis, 1626?-1702.

notesStmt.note: Title on added illustrated t.p., engraved, inlaid: Pellicanicidium ... by Sr. William Denny.
Illustrated t.p. is signed: F. Barlow.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
